title: Ep 30: Children of Bone and Blood Book Club + We're Both Having a Rough Week.
itunes:title: Ep 30: Children of Bone and Blood Book Club + We're Both Having a Rough Week.
description:
Happy Halloween! This episode, we're discussing our YA book of the month, Children of Bone and Blood! This was our first foray into the action/fantasy segment of YA reads and we LOVED IT. 

 

Also in this episode: we're both having a rough week. Becca is obsessed with her pineapple shaped eyeshadow from Tarte and Grace loves her Rihanna lip gloss.

Can't get enough Bad On Paper?

Join our FB group for amazing book recs & more

Follow us on Instagram @badonpaperpodcast

Sponsors:
